content:
Kartthan maamodeesaaykkum-yoohaanon saakshippaanum
Thaathan mal priyaputhranivan-ennothaan vaanilumetthi,

Snaanam nyaan neeril nalkum-pingaami vishu-ddhaathmaavil
Svasnaanattheprathi evam- skariyaaputhran ghoshichu.

Roopaviheenan thaathanum-snaanaarththham vannaathmajanum
Praavu samaanam moorddhaavil -meviya roohaaykkum sthothram.
